member.name: ID3D11VideoProcessorEnumerator.CheckVideoProcessorFormat
member.summary: Queries whether the video processor supports a specified video format.
member.param: The video format to query, specified as a value.
Receives a bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID3D11VideoProcessorEnumerator.GetVideoProcessorCaps
member.summary: Gets the capabilities of the video processor.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives the capabilities.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID3D11VideoProcessorEnumerator.GetVideoProcessorContentDesc
member.summary: Gets the content description that was used to create this enumerator.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives the content description.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID3D11VideoProcessorEnumerator.GetVideoProcessorCustomRate
member.summary: Gets a list of custom frame rates that a video processor supports.
member.param: The zero-based index of the frame-rate capability group. To get the maxmum index, call and check the RateConversionCapsCount member of the structure.

param.name: CustomRateIndex
param.para: The zero-based index of the custom rate to retrieve. To get the maximum index, call and check the CustomRateCount member of the structure.
This index value is always relative to the capability group specified in the TypeIndex parameter.

member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives the custom rate.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID3D11VideoProcessorEnumerator.GetVideoProcessorFilterRange
member.summary: Gets the range of values for an image filter.
member.param: The type of image filter, specified as a value.
A pointer to a structure. The method fills the structure with the range of values for the specified filter.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID3D11VideoProcessorEnumerator.GetVideoProcessorRateConversionCaps
member.summary: Returns a group of video processor capabilities that are associated with frame-rate conversion, including deinterlacing and inverse telecine.
member.param: The zero-based index of the group to retrieve. To get the maximum index, call and check the RateConversionCapsCount member of the structure.
A pointer to a structure that receives the frame-rate conversion capabilities.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID3D11VideoProcessorEnumerator
member.summary: Enumerates the video processor capabilities of a Microsoft Direct3D 11 device.
